subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: In the PGA Tour’s FedEx Cup playoffs Vijay Singh leads the second-place Sergio García by 12,225 points and the third-place Mike Weir by 13,535 points.
snippet: In the PGA Tour’s FedEx Cup playoffs Vijay Singh leads the second-place Sergio García by 12,225 points and the third-place Mike Weir by 13,535 points.
